title: Dog wash, Lounge with a chef's kitchen, Modern fitness facilities
posting_body: ['The Eddy', '10 New Street , East Boston, MA, 02128', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', '(617) 380-4884 x 15', 'OR Text', '15', 'to', '(617) 380-4884', 'for more information.', 'Welcome home to The Eddy', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 674.0 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'The Eddy is located along the waterfront in East Boston, boasting unrivaled views of the Boston skyline and within walking distance to an eclectic mix of restaurants, shops and entertainment.', "The Eddy is transit-oriented and serves as a bridge between Boston's most vibrant neighborhoods.", 'Pricing and availability subject to change.', 'Features', '- Locally-sourced and recycled-content materials', '- High-efficiency LED lighting', '- Well-designed living spaces', '- Energy Star-rated appliances', '- Nest Learning Thermostats™', '- Low-flow fixtures', 'Community Amenities', '- Dog wash', '- Outdoor terrace', '- Private conference rooms', '- Bike maintenance facilities', '- Rooftop deck with seating and 270° views', '- Sun deck', '- Grilling stations', '- Direct access to Lo Presti Park', '- Poolside restaurant service for residents', '- Secure bike parking', '- Well-served by transit through the blue line, an expanded water taxi station, highways and Logan Airport', '- Modern fitness facilities', '- Waterfront property with uninterrupted views of the Boston Harbor and city skyline', '- Access to boat landing', '- Access to a new waterfront park', '- Music room', "- Lounge with a chef's kitchen", '- Fireplace', '- Pet-friendly', '- On-site restaurant with indoor and outdoor dining spaces', '- Car sharing options', '- Pool', 'ww1NMr5D3CYC']
